title: Fragment Scp 8148-3
content:

**Special Containment Procedures:** Due to it's neutralization, SCP-8148 is no longer contained by the Foundation.

**Description:** SCP-8148 referred to a future version of Dr. Silvian King, a 27 year-old thaumatologist working for the Foundation. SCP-8148 would manifest at Temporary Object-Holding Sites, at //00:00//, on the day of security breaches. it would appear in an empty Temporary Dormitory at the site and would attempt to aid staff in activates as the day progressed. Each manifestation of SCP-8148 would have different memories of the breaches it took part in. Research into each manifestation has shown a liner track of memories, implying that, though SCP-8148 did not manifest linearly, it experienced time linearly. As of July 19th, 2024, SCP-8148's anomalous abilities have ceased.

**Addendum 8148.1 Post Anomalous Report:** By order of the Ethics Committee, Dr. Silvian King is to be employed by the Foundation and, due to an estimated 21.2 years of overtime, promoted to Senior Researcher. Dr. Zachary Peacock is to be reassigned and given a spot on the Ethics Committee due to his work with SCP-8148. Dr. Silvian King has requested to be transferred to Site-322 in order to work with staff on the [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/integration-program-hub Integration Program]. Request pending approval.
